vote.question: On the Joint Resolution
vote.title: S.J. Res. 54, As Amended; A joint resolution to direct the removal of United States Armed Forces from hostilities in the Republic of Yemen that have not been authorized by Congress.

vote.question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 4098
vote.title: Cotton Amdt. No. 4098; To clarify that the requirement to remove United States Armed Forces does not apply to forces engaged in operations to support efforts to disrupt Houthi attacks against locations outside of Yemen, such as ballistic missile attacks, unmanned aerial vehicle attacks, maritime attacks against United States or international vessels, or terrorist attacks against civilian targets.

vote.question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 4096
vote.title: Cornyn Amdt. No. 4096 As Modified; To provide that nothing in the joint resolution shall be construed to influence or disrupt any military operations and cooperation with Israel.

vote.question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 4080
vote.title: Young Amdt. No. 4080; To clarify that this resolution prohibits United States Armed Forces from refueling non-United States aircraft conducting missions as part of the ongoing civil war in Yemen.

vote.question: On the Point of Order
vote.title: Is the Underlying Point of Order Well Taken that Amendments Under Section 50 U.S.C. 1546a be Germane to the Underlying Joint Resolution; A joint resolution to direct the removal of United States Armed Forces from hostilities in the Republic of Yemen that have not been authorized by Congress.

vote.question: On the Motion to Proceed
vote.title: Motion to Proceed S.J. Res. 54; A joint resolution to direct the removal of United States Armed Forces from hostilities in the Republic of Yemen that have not been authorized by Congress.
